channel.title: [562] How to make someone die at a place? [562]
channel.description:
How to make someone die at one place when hes leaping on it
i have a round of fire on me home but i want if u stand on fire u die?
Can someone help?

item.title: [562] How to make someone die at a place? [562]
item.dc:creator: @Sponge-Bob Sponge-Bob
item.description:
@Sponge-Bob wrote:

[quote=“laurent 248, post:7, topic:368085”]K i think i got it.

I cant remember where u could add it. Maybe somewhere in actionsender.java

if(player.getLocation().getX() == 3333 && player.getLocation().getY() == 3333) { player.hit(99); }

Post ur error if u get some.

It’s not tested.[/quote]

Ive added it.

But when im on the coords 3333 3333 as in example i do not die.
